title: The main idea of the announcement

content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Chinese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.
Public announcement
content.question: This announcement asks passengers to

choices.label: yield seats to passengers who need them
take all personal belongings when exiting

content.answer: yield seats to passengers who need them

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
